name: Yarn Journey
description:
You are a ball of yarn. Unwind and Rewind to get through each level, and watch out for scissors along the way!

There is no built in timer as of right now, but I would love to see how fast someone can beat this.

This game was made for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2 game jam.

Controls:

E: Unwind yarn

Q: Rewind yarn

Left Click: attach to hook

Right Click: detach from hook

Credits:

Background Textures: n4

Level Complete Sound Effect: Jason Dagenet
